external_games.name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Black Hill Fortress MP089

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Black Hill Fortress MP089
summary: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ: Black Hill Fortress is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, and defeat all the enemy tanks. This DLC includes the map pack 089.
